name: Merlin Project
summary: An MPROJECT file is a project plan created in ProjectWizards Merlin Project or Merlin Project Express, project management programs available for macOS and iOS. It contains a number of component files, including .SQL, .TXT. and .PNG files, used to save and load a project plan in Merlin Project or Project Express. MPROJECT files replaced .MERLIN2 files when Merlin Project replaced Merlin.
